title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Grand Haaram - The "Indrani"
materials: this haaram showcases a dazzling array of brilliant-cut diamonds. The design is accented with natural
vibrant green emeralds (5.15 carat and 1.77 carat) and rich red rubies (7.25 carat)
meticulously set to enhance their natural beauty. Boasting a Hyderabadi polish.
features: This grand haaram features a intricate, layered design that embodies traditional South Indian elegance. The floral motifs are exquisitely crafted and set with diamonds, while the emerald drops provide a captivating contrast. The pendant is detachable and can be used as a brooch. The design includes traditional motifs, and a antique finish is applied to enhance its timeless appeal.
colors: The overall color scheme is a luxurious blend of golden yellow from the gold
and touches of deep red from the rubies. This classic South Indian color palette evokes a sense of richness and tradition.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a statement of timeless elegance. Ideal for a Muhurtham
as well as high-profile social gatherings.
description: This haaram is a true heirloom piece, blending impeccable craftsmanship with timeless design. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures its enduring value, while the detachable pendant offers versatility. It represents a fusion of traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern luxury.
